title: Leek and goat cheese quiche
ingredients: ['1 large savoury pastry case', '3 leeks - white and light green parts only, halved lengthwise and sliced', '3 eggs', '120ml whipping cream', '120ml milk', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh chives', '1/4 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper', '60g soft goat cheese, crumbled']
